body.p:
Covington Aug 23 -- 1865
His Excellency
Thos E Bramlette
Gov of Kentucky
Sir

I hereby make an application for a requsition upon the Governor of Ohio for Lucy Elizabeth Stover alias Elizabeth Snyder alias Elizabeth Surface who is a fugitive from justice from this State This application is based upon an original affidavit of Andrew I Surface, which is herewith transmitted to your Excellency. I believe the affiant to be a credible
person and the facts set forth in his affidavit to be true I suggest Moses Nelson Esqr as a proper person to act as agent for the state

Very Respcty
Your Excellency's
most obt servt
R B Carpenter
Commth Atty
9th Judicial
Dist
